item.kubejs.contract.use.0: Contract: NO take backsies! (Hover to read small print)
item.kubejs.contract.use.1: Small Print: Anything you ever create is proprietary property of ME and your soul is MINE... FOR ALL OF ETERNITY!! BARRY WITHHOLDS THE RIGHT TO DESTROY YOUR MORTAL COIL AT ANY GIVEN MOMENT.. THIS CONTRACT HAS BEEN SIGNED BY THE PLAYER AND IS LEGALLY BINDING IN MINECRAFT AND THE REAL WORLD!! *The writing becomes so small that it's unreadable...*
item.kubejs.corporea_crystal.desc:
A strange Crystal capable of exchanging information with others of its kind.
The core of important Corporea devices.
item.mce2.blade_of_eternal_torment.desc: Forged in the depths of the Nether. Used to torment and torture enemies of The Eternal Legion.
item.mce2.quest_loot.desc.3: "An assortment of miscellaneous items of varying usefulness found within The Quest Master's storage locker and repackaged as your reward!"
tooltip.mce2.occultism.stable_wormhole.f: Unstable! The Wormhole will break when picked up!
tooltip.mce2.ae2.facade.can_be_made_with: Can be made using most blocks
tooltip.mce2.bomd.soul_star: Drops after killing many Undead mobs!
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.generic:
Can be combined with other Accessories to craft Runes
Efficiency Bonus can be re-rolled by crafting Accessories with copies of themselves
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.ad: Crafted from Adventurer Kit, Ancient Scarab and Swimmer Guide
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.an: Crafted from Angler Trophy, Metal Lure and Unbreakable Fishing Line
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.ho: Crafted from Dream Catcher, Discount Voucher and Secret Ingredient
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.mi: Crafted from Miner Guide, Tool Scraps, and Lucky Rock
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.na: Crafted from Certificate of Taming, Idol of Fertility and Tamed Potato Beetle
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.soul.mi: Crafted from Adventurer Rune, Angler Rune, Household Rune, Miner Rune and Nature Rune

Â§7Â§oIf we could somehow... harness this lightning channel into the Flux Capacitor, it just might work. Next Saturday night, we are sending you back to the future!!

tooltip.mce2.kubejs.morbo_orb.2: Â§7Â§oBroken into two pieces and given to powerful guardians to prevent evil from ever touching this powerful artifact, if that happened the world as we know it would change forever.. Morbos Magnum Opus.

tooltip.mce2.netherexp.sculk_grinder.2: Â§8I wonder if something could absorb this power?

tooltip.mce2.endrem.black_eye.1: Â§eâ–¸Drops from Ghost of Captain Cornelia (Overworld)

tooltip.mce2.pitchperfect: Changes note depending on where you look!
message.mce2.soul_stone_peer: You peer into the Soul Stone and see a vision of The Great Beyond... Eternal darkness... Countless souls singing and dancing... Countless screaming and writhing.. It seems some take to death better than others..
message.mce2.ultimate_cheese_cooldown: The cheese is still cooling down! (%ss)
message.mce2.ultimate_cheese_used: The Cheese fills your wounds, Healing you!
message.mce2.reactor_tnt_touch: Â§aThe reactor hums with unstable energy...
message.mce2.reactor_tnt_broken: Â§4The broken reactor releases a wave of sickening energy!
message.mce2.the_great_below.1: The Wither Heart beats in your hand, making you feel unwell.
message.mce2.the_great_below.2: The echos of The Great Below contaminate your mind.. Tendrils writhing and wreathing...  Causing you lose touch with reality and giving you a primal fear you cannot fully explain.. You hear it deep within your brain. Your thoughts are not your own and you are not alone..
page.mce2.the_great_below.1:
Staring at the sea...
Will she come?

Is there hope for me?
After all is said and done..

Anything at any price.
All of this is for you..

All the spoils of a wasted life...

All of this for you..
page.mce2.the_great_below.2:
All the world has closed her eyes.

Tired faith all worn and thin..

For all we could have done..

And all that could have been.

Ocean pulls me close..
page.mce2.the_great_below.3:
It whispers in my ear..

The destiny I've chose.

All becoming clear..

The currents have their say..

The time is drawing near..

Washes me away...
page.mce2.the_great_below.4:
Makes me disappear.

And I descend from grace.

In arms of undertow..

I will take my place...





IN THE GREAT BELOW!
page.mce2.the_great_below.5:
I can still feel you..

Even so far away..
message.mce2.transport_quick_travel.1: Â§6[Hoppy]Â§7 Thank you for flying with me! Be careful out there! Primordium is endlessly dark and freezing. I won't land I'm afraid! I'm far too handsome to be eaten by undead! So I'll have to air-drop you down! Good Luck!!
lore.mce2.transport_quick_travel.1: Â§eÂ§oThis is the best airplane food you've ever eaten you whisper to yourself...
message.mce2.transport_quick_travel.2: [Rat Pilot Romone] Thank you for flying Rat-Air! We have arrived at our destination. The Sakura Dimension is beautiful this time of year! Enjoy!
message.mce2.transport_quick_travel.3: Â§6[Ship Captain]Â§7 We have arrived! We hope you have enjoyed your time with DreamCruise! Please make your way off the ship and to the beach! Enjoy a complimentary PiÃ±a colada on us to help get you in the tropical spirit! I've been your captain! Farewell!
lore.mce2.transport_quick_travel.3: Â§bÂ§oThis is the second best airline food you've ever eaten you whisper to yourself..
message.mce2.transport_quick_travel.5: Thank you for flying Rat-Air! We have arrived at our destination! Brace for impact and put on your parachute!
page.mce2.animal_compendium.1:
Â§cÂ§lHALT!
------

Â§7Please do make sure to not disturb the animals! You will be granted a wildlife photography licence on the condition that you Â§dÂ§nRESPECT NATURE!

Â§7Don't make me get Swampy Bogbeard!
lore.mce2.bosses.1: Â§oÂ§fÂ§oCold to the touch, yet indescribably comforting
message.mce2.bosses.1: Â§eÂ§oÂ§7Â§oHolding the lantern up to the letter you realise someone has used invisible ink to write the title of the letter! The contents of the letter seem the same but the title was hidden.. How strange..
lore.mce2.bosses.4: Â§7Â§o"The Questmaster lost this weapon while trying to have a failed chat with The Ferrous Wroughtnaut... they aren't much of a conversationalist it turns out!"
lore.mce2.bosses.5: Â§8Â§oHow do you not have fish? It says fresh fish daily on the menu!
lore.mce2.bosses.6: Â§8Â§oJust get me the snapper bozo!
lore.mce2.challenges.1: Â§7Â§kkÂ§fÂ§7"LIFE DEATH LIFE DEATH LIFE DEATH"Â§kf
lore.mce2.challenges.3: Â§9Â§oThe Crystalline Fishing Rod was thought to be nothing more than a myth.. Until now!
lore.mce2.challenges.5: Â§7"This crab is so undercooked I can still hear it singing 'Under the Sea."
page.mce2.challenges.1:
What the Nagus wants, we acquire.

Once you have their money... you never give it back.

Money is Â§leverything

Â§8Â§oThis page is damaged
-----------------
page.mce2.challenges.2:
Never spend more for an acquisition than you have to.

Sedition and treason are always profitable

Always exaggerate your estimates.

Never allow family law stand in the way of opportunity.
page.mce2.challenges.3:
Keep your ears open.

Small print leads to large risk

Opportunity plus instinct equals profit

Greed is eternal

Anything worth doing is worth doing for money.
page.mce2.challenges.4:
Sometimes the quickest way to find profits is to let them find you.

Dead men close no deals.

A deal is a deal... until a better one comes along.
page.mce2.challenges.5:
A contract is a contract is a contract... but only between Ferengi

A Ferengi without profit is no Ferengi at all

Satisfaction is not guaranteed.
page.mce2.challenges.6:
He who dives under the table today lives to profit tomorrow.

Never place friendship above profit.

A wise man can hear profit in the wind.
page.mce2.challenges.7:
Nothing is more important than your health... except for your money.

There's nothing more dangerous than an honest businessman.

What's in it for me?

"Confidentiality equals profit."
page.mce2.challenges.8:
Never make fun of a Ferengi's mother. Insult something he cares about instead.

It never hurts to suck up to the boss

War is good for business.

Peace is good for business.
page.mce2.challenges.9:
The early investor reaps the most interest.

Don't tell customers more than they need to know.

She can touch your lobes but never your latinum.
page.mce2.challenges.10:
Profit is its own reward.

Feed your greed, but not enough to choke it.

Never confuse wisdom with luck.

Expand or die.
page.mce2.challenges.11:
Don't trust a man wearing a better suit than your own.

The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife.

Never ask when you can take.

Never trust anybody taller than you.
page.mce2.challenges.12:
Rate divided by time equals profit. (Also known as "The Velocity of Wealth.")

Take joy from profit, and profit from joy.

Good customers are as rare as latinumâ€”treasure them.
page.mce2.challenges.13:
There is no substitute for success.

Free advice is seldom cheap.

Keep your lies consistent.

The riskier the road, the greater the profit.
page.mce2.challenges.14: Â§8Â§oThe rest of the book is damaged... The pages seem to have been forcefully removed
lore.mce2.challenges.8: Â§fÂ§oThis prestigious piece of armor is awarded to those who have battled dozens of dragons and protected the realm from their plight!
message.mce2.challenges.2:
This JUST in! We have some important news! {p} has officially beaten all known Quest Chapters! Wowza! Congrats to {p} for unlocking The Loremaster Title, it seems they have a LOT of free time! 
Anyway, thanks for tuning in to this weeks OVERWORLD RADIO BROADCAST OF THE MONTH! come back next month! I'm Chip Chiply and you've just been told... THE NEWS!
message.mce2.clthe_nether.2: You hear a strange voice beckoning you to approach the altar...
lore.mce2.create.1: A Letter that you can hardly read
lore.mce2.create.2: You can barely make out the words cease and desist
message.mce2.dev.1: All of a sudden you feel afraid of the dark... You feel deeply unsettled.. Better stay in the light.. Who knows what lurks in the dark...
lore.mce2.dev.1: Â§7Â§o"Each Quest Book is meticulously hand printed by The Questmaster! Don't lose it! They take it personally!"
message.mce2.dev.2: You feel... afraid ... Like something is watching you... Hunting you... Maybe I shouldn't have done that..
message.mce2.dev.3: Hi! You have started a new world! Amazing! Give it a few minutes for spawn to generate and expect a bit of lag, The rats are building your world!
message.mce2.dev.4: Grab a warm drink or something! :D
lore.mce2.dev.4: RETURN ON TIME OR FACE FINES!
lore.mce2.dev.8: SO DON'T STEAL A RAT! RAT THEFT IS A CRIME!
lore.mce2.dev.11: Â§4Â§nRETURN ON TIME OR FACE FINES!
lore.mce2.dev.15: Â§7Â§oÂ§4Â§lSO DON'T STEAL A RAT! RAT THEFT IS A CRIME!
lore.mce2.introduction.2: Â§7Â§oThis can't really be legally binding can it?
lore.mce2.introduction.4: Â§8Â§oThis is only a copy.. don't try anything! I'm watching you! With my two beady eyes...
message.mce2.introduction.1: {p} has started their Questbook! Waahoo! â˜†
message.mce2.introduction.2: and you should too! If you haven't already! :D
lore.mce2.introduction.5: Â§eOnly given to those who have completed the "Getting Started" Quest Chapter!
lore.mce2.introduction.7: Â§6Â§oGifted to only the most loyal of rat lords..
lore.mce2.introduction.11: Â§7Â§oOne time use, I should use this on an unlit campfire!
message.mce2.introduction.3: Click to Join the MC Eternal Discord!
message.mce2.introduction.4: You did not sign the contract and have been cursed for your insolence!
lore.mce2.introduction.13: Â§7Â§oThe Questmaster wore this boot every day for at least 80 Years! They found it at the bottom of a lake! Now you can have the pleasure of equipping it!
lore.mce2.introduction.14: Â§7Â§oNeeded for the quest Â§e"It's Shop' O Clock"
message.mce2.introduction.6: {p} just requested Pigstep! Coming right up!
message.mce2.introduction.7: {p} just requested Jellyfish Fields! Coming right up!
lore.mce2.introduction.17: Â§7Â§oOwned by the legendary Dancing Cockroach. Gifted to one brilliant Player who listened to his Award-Winning tunes!
lore.mce2.introduction.18: He wasn't going to kill you with that kitchen knife silly! He was just preparing you a slice of cheese!
message.mce2.introduction.8: You are a Pureblood Vampire... Thus you have started the game with "Sanguinare Vampiris"!
lore.mce2.introduction.19: Â§7Â§oYou were born into a prestigious line of Pureblooded Vampires... now it is your duty to become the most powerful Vampire and make them proud...
lore.mce2.introduction.21: Â§7Â§oI guess meat really is back on the menu!
lore.mce2.introduction.23: Â§7Â§oJust like Granny Bacon used to make it!
lore.mce2.introduction.25: Â§7Â§oYou are a mighty dwarf! You inherited this pickaxe from your great grandfather.. who was also a MIGHTY DWARF!
lore.mce2.introduction.27: Â§6Â§oNote: Â§7To future generations, please do not use this pickaxe to mine.. it is symbolic and for all intensive purposes purely ceremonial, any dwarf knows gold is a TERRIBLE material to mine with! This pickaxe has been in our family for hundreds of years!
lore.mce2.introduction.30: somewhere in your home and use it to warp to other Waystones you find in the world at the cost of XP!
lore.mce2.introduction.31: Additionally you can use it to warp home from unlocked Waystones!
lore.mce2.introduction.37: Make sure to bind it to your
lore.mce2.llegendary_artifacts.2: Bow combined with a Nether Star
message.mce2.mailbox.2: â†’ You have received a letter from Mom! Open your Quest Book!
page.mce2.mailbox.2:
I hope you enjoy these recipes as much as I did.

Love,
Your Gruncle Vlad
message.mce2.mailbox.3: â†’ You have received a letter from Gruncle Vlad! Open your Quest Book!
message.mce2.mailbox.4: â†’ You have received a letter from Grandma! Open your Quest Book!
lore.mce2.mining.1: Â§7Â§o"Once belonged to the legendary dwarf Honeydew, it was used for digging holes.. allegedly."
lore.mce2.mining.2: Â§7Â§o"Forged by the finest Dwarven blacksmiths from Khaz Modan!"
lore.mce2.occultism.3: Â§7Â§6Â§oÂ§7Â§o"An assortment of miscellaneous items of varying usefulness found within The Quest Master's storage locker and repackaged as your reward!"
lore.mce2.blackmarket_cache.1: Â§oWith great power comes a terrible hangover
lore.mce2.blackmarket_cache.2: Â§6Become invulnerable for a limited time
lore.mce2.blackmarket_cache.5: Â§3Â§3Feels slightly magical, has a taste for Experience
lore.mce2.blackmarket_cache.10: Â§bUnlocks the power of Â§lThe Sculptor! Â§rÂ§bÂ§o(briefly)
lore.mce2.blackmarket_cache.12: Despite being made of solid ice, this weapon is not cold...
name.mce2.food_slot.1: Â§eAdam's World Famous Blazing Chilli Extravaganza
lore.mce2.forgotten_trashcan.2: Doesn't seem very homemade to me
page.mce2.goodie_bag.15:
Â§dÂ§oThank you for reading.

Be sure to purchase our second book "Animals 2".

Now at village libraries near you!
lore.mce2.hand_me_down.1: Â§7Â§oUsed to belong to my great uncle! Apparently he was eaten by a dragon. The hat is mostly fireproof, made of asbestos he proudly said! Which is why it is the only part of him that was found Â§orelatively intact...
lore.mce2.hand_me_down.2: Â§7Â§oThese shoes belong to your father! You haven't seen him since he set sail in search of treasure! I wonder if he found any...
lore.mce2.holiday_hamper.1: Â§fÂ§oYou've arrived! Hooray! And you are only slightly seasick!
lore.mce2.holiday_hamper.3: Â§8Â§oYou don't bring the party.. You ARE the party!
lore.mce2.mom_market.1: When your married you'll understand the importance of fresh produce!
lore.mce2.packed_lunch.1: Â§7Â§oWarm and comforting, the Hot Cocoa can cure just about anything -Mom
lore.mce2.packed_lunch.2: Â§7Mom's famous Honey Cookies. Â§7Â§oMade especially for you!
lore.mce2.packed_lunch.4: Â§7Â§oTasty enough to make your knees weak
lore.mce2.packed_lunch.6: Â§7Â§oPacked lunch! The crusts are cut off just how you like it! Â§d-Mom Â§rÂ§dâ¤
lore.mce2.packed_lunch.7: Â§7Makes you feel strong! Mom always makes this whenever you fell ill. Thanks Mom!
lore.mce2.quest_loot.1: "Â§7Â§oYour my friend now were having soft tacos later!!"
lore.mce2.quest_loot.3: Â§9Â§7Â§oEmbued with special Anti Magicâ„¢ properties
lore.mce2.quest_loot.6: Â§oÂ§7this potato woke up and chose violence
lore.mce2.quest_loot.8: Â§7tiny potato is a mod by ..
message.mce2.quest_loot.4: I opened this Quest Loot and all I got was this stupid message!
lore.mce2.quest_loot.16: Â§7Â§oI think this rat drowned in a Potion of Health Boost...
lore.mce2.quest_loot.19: Â§3Subjected to extreme quality control for the best quality dirt
lore.mce2.quest_loot.20: Â§3Â§lTriple infused Â§rÂ§3with our patented diamond dirt refining technique!â„¢
lore.mce2.quest_loot.21: Â§3Â§oEach dirt block is inspected by Sips_ himself before shipment to ensure perfection.. nothing less...
lore.mce2.quest_loot.22: Â§7Boring Legal Gibberish For Nerds  Â§rÂ§7â†“
lore.mce2.quest_loot.23: Â§8Â§oNo diamonds are present in the product, our dirt is momentarily exposed to a diamond at some point during the manufacturing process as per regulation and then promptly removed as documented in the "Sips Co. 32 Secret Herbs and Spicesâ„¢" dirt manufacturing process.
name.mce2.quest_loot.7: Premium Diamond Grade Sips Co.â„¢ Quality Dirt
lore.mce2.quest_loot.24: Â§7Â§oInvented by a mad scientist who once was so lonely his only friend was a balloon called Balloony... which eventually left him too..
lore.mce2.quest_loot.26: Â§8Â§oBelonged to The Questmaster, what is inside you ask? Gross! why would you even care?
tips.mce2.title: MCE2 TIP
tips.mce2.9x9: Don't like to build? use the Copy-Paste Gadget and go to Â§9reddit.com/r/9x9
tips.mce2.amethyst_tools: Amethyst Tools come pre-enchanted with Veinmining!
tips.mce2.ancient: Ancient Skeletons are not to be underestimated!
tips.mce2.arrows: Arrow crits have a chance to do 3x damage!
tips.mce2.axe: Axes are now weapons! They will not lose any additional damage or durability when used as a weapon!
tips.mce2.bed: Sleeping in a bed for a full night will restore all of your health and remove negative status effects! Gotta get that beauty sleep!
tips.mce2.blackmarket: The Blackmarket Cache is high risk high reward!
tips.mce2.blackmarket_cache_info: The Blackmarket Cache contains random items ranging from, unobtainable items, silly items and useless items.
tips.mce2.bonus_hearts: Eating new foods can sometimes reward bonus hearts!
tips.mce2.boss: If you die 3 times while fighting a boss, their health will regenerate!
tips.mce2.bossmobs: Most boss mobs have been heavily buffed and some even have bonus abilities, come prepared!
tips.mce2.brazier: The Brazier multiblock can stop monsters from spawning in its radius!
tips.mce2.brown_bear: Brown Bears love honey, do not come between a Brown Bear and their honey..
tips.mce2.brutal_bosses: Sometimes a mini-boss can spawn at a loot chest! Beware! They have all sorts of tricks up their sleeves!
tips.mce2.cache1: The Adventuring Cache can be purchased from the Quest Shop and contains useful items for a new adventurer!
tips.mce2.carcass: The Carcass can be reanimated with a Flint and Steel!
tips.mce2.catadim: By crafting a boss eye from catacylsm, you can enter their dimension and slay them there!
tips.mce2.chunk_loader: Chunk Loaders can be crafted, they will load chunks even when you are away from your base!
tips.mce2.claim: Claiming chunks will prevent explosions and unwanted players/entities from breaking blocks. Always claim your chunks! You can claim chunks by opening &dThe Chunk Map
tips.mce2.cloud_storage: Cloud storage is a low tech storage solution! Send your items up into the cloud!
tips.mce2.coin_shop: You can spend your questing coins at the quest shop which is accessible in the quest book! New items for sale will unlock as you progress through the quest book!
tips.mce2.combat_roll: You can roll by pressing R! You can view your stamina on the middle-left of the screen.
tips.mce2.compass: The Explorer's Compass can be used to locate structures containing Legendary Eyes!
tips.mce2.complex_food: Eating complex foods can reward you with bonus saturation and sometimes positive status effects.
tips.mce2.cowinajar: The Cow In a Jar will provide passive amounts of milk to your kitchen!
tips.mce2.create: Create's waterwheels can be powered with lava as well as water!
tips.mce2.create1: Small Water Wheels produce 256 Stress Units
tips.mce2.create2: Large Water Wheels Produce 512 Stress Units!
tips.mce2.create_contraptions: Create contraptions can be an excellent early game solution to ore processing, look into it!
tips.mce2.creeper_milk: Milking a Creeper produces the illusive Creeper Milk!
tips.mce2.creeperawman: Creepers have a small chance to explode into fireworks!
tips.mce2.croc: Crocodiles are apex predators, avoid engaging them in combat at all costs!
tips.mce2.curio: Every Curio usually has either a unique ability or bonus stats for the wielder, except for cosmetic ones!
tips.mce2.curioscustom: There are over 100+ custom curios to collect! can you find them all?
tips.mce2.custom: MC Eternal 2 has lots of custom content, you are unlikely to experience all of it in one playthrough!
tips.mce2.dagger: The humble Dagger on its own is a modest weapon. Dual Wielding them however is a different story!
tips.mce2.daily: Daily Quests can be completed every day! You can find the Daily Quests you've unlocked in your Quest  Book.
tips.mce2.daily_rewards: Every day you log in you can claim a Daily Reward! use /DailyRewards Claim to check your progress!
tips.mce2.dangerous_creatures: Dangerous monsters wearing armor and wielding weapons begin spawning in The Overworld after visiting The Nether!
tips.mce2.dark_side_of_the_force: The dark side of The Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
tips.mce2.deeper: The deeper you go, the stronger the monsters become!
tips.mce2.difficulty: Expert Mode and Master Mode increases your local difficulty!
tips.mce2.discord: Never touched a certain mod before and want advice? Why not join the MC Eternal Discord for help!
tips.mce2.dragonsteel: Dragonsteel is quite the status symbol! It also gives increased resistance to dragon attacks!
tips.mce2.dwarven_caverns: The Dwarven Caverns have a coordinate scale of 4! Meaning you can travel 4 times as fast relative to the Overworld!
tips.mce2.dwarven_caverns1: The Dwarven Caverns is said to have endless resources! The Dwarves became the richest in the land, until they vanished.. Some say they dug too deep.. Disturbed some sort of ancient evil...
tips.mce2.epicfight: Watch out! Certain humanoid creatures can dodge, roll and use special attacks! Avoid heavy attacks or you might get stunned!
tips.mce2.expert_mode_1: Entering The Nether will start Expert Mode, this will increase the difficulty and cause new scary monsters to spawn!
tips.mce2.expertandmaster: Expert & Master Mode bring a plethora of new creatures to The Overworld
tips.mce2.exploring: Have you tried exploring? There are dozens of unique dungeons to uncover!
tips.mce2.eye: Struggling to find bosses from Cataclysm? Crafting the Eye related to each boss allows you to teleport to a dimension containing the boss!
tips.mce2.eyes: Collect all 12 of the Legendary Eyes to open a portal to The End. This is no easy task!
tips.mce2.fast_travel: The fast travel quest chapter lets you fast travel back to spawn in style!
tips.mce2.feed_your_pets: Don't forget to feed your pets!
tips.mce2.fishes: The difficulty changes in Master Mode and Expert mode are per questing team! So play at your own pace!
tips.mce2.food: There are many different foods to craft. A varied diet will reward you with extra hearts!
tips.mce2.gadget: Mining Gadgets are cool! You should check them out!
tips.mce2.ghosts: You can only damage Ghosts with magic damage or silver weapons!
tips.mce2.glowberries: Watch out for Miner Zombies underground! They can dig stone!
tips.mce2.golem: Iron Golems have a ranged attack and can be repaired by a Blacksmith Villager!
tips.mce2.greatbelow: Rumour has it that your Mini-Map and World-Map will not work in The Great Below...
tips.mce2.greatbelowmap: Legend says your Minimap will not work in The Great Below.. No signal I guess...
tips.mce2.guard_villager: Guard Villagers are an elite group of trained villagers who have a sworn duty to protect the village. Do not attack or steal from villagers when they are present!
tips.mce2.hammer: Hammer weapon types do large amounts of AOE damage every third attack!
tips.mce2.hearts: Eating different foods have a chance to give you a permanent bonus heart!
tips.mce2.help: If you need help, the MCE Discord is the best place! Check faq, tips, client-questions-and-issues, and server-questions-and-issues, or come hang out in mce-general!
tips.mce2.heretic: Villagers have a chance of converting into Heretics if they're sleeping near an active Nether Portal!
tips.mce2.holding: The Holding enchantment increases the capacity of most Thermal Expansion storages including Satchels, Reservoirs, Energy cells, and more!
tips.mce2.home: You can use /tpa to teleport to another player!
tips.mce2.humanoid: Humanoid monsters can special attack with their weapons!
tips.mce2.immersive_aircraft: Immersive Aircraft offers numerous methods of awesome air based travel!
tips.mce2.inspect: Middle Mouse Clicking another player will let you inspect their currently equipped gear!
tips.mce2.introquest: Finishing all of the Introduction Quests will reward you with a special prize!
tips.mce2.inventory_space: Running out of inventory space? Craft a backpack!
tips.mce2.iron_golem: Iron Golems are much more powerful. Might be worth making one or two for your base!
tips.mce2.ladders: You can teleport to the top of a ladder by Right-Clicking the bottom block at the cost of some hunger!
tips.mce2.light: Dynamic Lights are here! Try it out and hold a torch in your off-hand!
tips.mce2.master_mode1: Entering The End and killing The End Dragon will start Master Mode, this will increase the difficulty and cause new powerful monsters to spawn!
tips.mce2.mceletters: Entering each game stage will reward you with a letter, I wonder who is writing these?
tips.mce2.miner: Look out for Miner Zombies! They can slowly break stone!
tips.mce2.modes: MC Eternal 2 has difficulty modes, after reaching major milestones new creatures will begin to spawn!
tips.mce2.moonquest: Flying a rocket? HOLD SPACE TO SLOW DOWN!!
tips.mce2.moving_house1: Moving house? You can use Cardboard Boxes to move chests & blocks very quickly!
tips.mce2.mp1: You can see players on the Minimap and Worldmap and they can see you! If you crouch you will become hidden to other players however!
tips.mce2.multiblock: Multiblocks can exhibit unexpected behavior when they cross chunks. Press F9 twice to see chunk borders.
tips.mce2.multiplayer_bosses: Bosses have their health increased in Multiplayer! So team up and vanquish these evil foes together!
tips.mce2.naga: Naga Acid is very dangerous. Try to evade their ranged attacks and return fire!
tips.mce2.nether: The Nether in MCE2 is a scary & big place! Set Waypoints!
tips.mce2.nether2: The Nether in MCE2 is a scary & big place! Biomes are bigger than usual!
tips.mce2.new: New player? check out the ingame tutorial presented by our friend Barry!
tips.mce2.newhome: Check buildings before settling down. Someone might already be home!
tips.mce2.newmods: Try new mods! You might find new and enjoyable ways to accomplish ordinary tasks!
tips.mce2.night_time: Night time temporarily increases the max count and max health of monsters, making monsters more plentiful and powerful!
tips.mce2.nightmares: You can't sleep in a bed unless you are safely inside shelter! Otherwise you have a high chance of experiencing an Eerie Nightmare!
tips.mce2.no: No! Don't put that full backpack in your ME System!
tips.mce2.normal: Stay in Normal Mode if you wish! The game will only get harder when you want it to!
tips.mce2.nuke_arrow: Do not fire a Nuke Arrow at your friends base! You have been warned!
tips.mce2.oneshot: You will never be one-shot, you will always be reduced to 1/2 a heart if you take fatal damage, giving you time to react
tips.mce2.osmium: Osmium and Fluorite can both only be found in &eThe Great Below!
tips.mce2.palantir: You cannot open a Nether Portal without The Obsidian Palantir!
tips.mce2.paragliders: Paragliders can be found on the tops of Wild Towers, they can also be crafted!
tips.mce2.part_builder: Rule of Thumb: if there's no Casting recipe for a Tinkers' part, it's done in the Part Builder
tips.mce2.performance_difficultues: If you are having performance difficulties, try adjusting your graphics settings and increasing your RAM!
tips.mce2.pet: Pets given a bed will respawn there when they die!!
tips.mce2.plague: Look out for the Plague! if you become infected, you won't be able to regenerate health until the effect has worn off! Plague Doctors can sometimes sell you the cure.
tips.mce2.projectile_immunity: Some bosses have projectile immunity at a certain distance!
tips.mce2.quest: By doing Quests you can collect Coins, these coins can be spent at the Quest Shop!
tips.mce2.quest_loot: Quest loot contains an assortment of items ranging from useful to silly.
tips.mce2.questbook: The Quest Book is an excellent place to look for things to do!
tips.mce2.questing: Questing is an excellent way of gathering interesting items!
tips.mce2.raid: Village raids have gotten a little harder! Come prepared!!
tips.mce2.rats: Rats are great critter alternatives to machines and wires for automation! They can also be bodyguards!
tips.mce2.rats_tamed: Cheese can be used to tame rats!
tips.mce2.ratsack: Need to move your rats long distances or through dimensions? use a Rat Sack to store them safely!
tips.mce2.recursive: Don't put backpacks in backpacks... And do not put containers that store items into your ME system - you might have a hard time extracting them again
tips.mce2.reloadgun: Hold ALT to reload a gun!
tips.mce2.resovoir: The Reservoir from Thermal Expansion can be used as a larger bucket for most crafting recipes requiring fluid!
tips.mce2.rift.title: MCE2 TIP:
tips.mce2.rift: After killing a boss, a rift will appear! click the rift to activate it! click it again to teleport you home!
tips.mce2.roll: You can Combat Roll by pressing R!
tips.mce2.roll2: Upon doing a Combat Roll, you will gain half a second of i-frames! Making you evade an attack if timed correctly!
tips.mce2.sandwich: The Sandwich Station can be used to create entirely custom sandwiches! You can combine foods into one big sandwich!
tips.mce2.scute: Scute can be used to craft Turtle Armor which provides resistance and increased swim speed at the cost of slowness on land!
tips.mce2.seagull: Watch out for Seagulls! They will eat the food straight out of your pocket!
tips.mce2.set: Different Spell Schools have different strengths and weaknesses!
tips.mce2.shaders: Shaders are compatible thanks to Oculus, use at your own risk!
tips.mce2.shield2: Sleeping in a bed for a full night will restore all of your health and remove negative status effects! Gotta get that beauty sleep!
tips.mce2.shields: Shields can be used instantly, there is no blocking delay!
tips.mce2.skills: You can access your skills menu by pressing K! You can earn skill points by playing and doing different activities!
tips.mce2.skylands: Above the sky and higher than high, a dimension awaits and its just great!
tips.mce2.slime_king_attack: The Slime King's slam attack will do armor piercing damage, be careful!
tips.mce2.slime_king_regards: The Slime King sends his regards!
tips.mce2.space: What mysteries exist in space? It's up to you to find out!
tips.mce2.sponge_clear: If you want to protect your pets from the cold grasp of death, look into Soulbound!
tips.mce2.spyglass: Using a Spyglass, you can gaze upon planets and stars!
tips.mce2.strays: Strays have a chance to freeze their targets, this effect will go through shields! Make sure to evade their attacks!
tips.mce2.tc: Want to customize your own tools? Check out Tinkers Construct!
tips.mce2.tc_katana: The Tinkers Construct Katana has a unique ability, it can be used to block after landing a hit! Katanas are the only weapon to possess this power!
tips.mce2.the_great_below: Cloud storage is a low tech storage solution! Send your items up into the cloud!
tips.mce2.titles: Titles are special trophies awarded to you after completing certain challenges, you can equip a Title and show it off for all to see!
tips.mce2.tpa: You can use /tpa to teleport to a friend!
tips.mce2.trains: Create Trains are an awesome way to travel! When powered with Coal they can travel up to 1 thousand blocks a minute!
tips.mce2.transmog: Using the Transmogification mod you can make your armor, weapons and items look like other items! Want to wear a powerful helmet but hate how it looks? Want to make your sword look like a carrot? Transmog is the solution!
tips.mce2.vampire_forest: The Vampire Forest dimension is a perfect home for vampire players!
tips.mce2.veinmine: Veinmining can be used by enchanting a tool with the Veinmining Enchant. Or adding Enchanted Alloy to a Tinkers Construct Tool!
tips.mce2.village_hero: Sometimes you can find The Village Hero or The Trash Man hanging around villages!
tips.mce2.warden: You cannot kill The Warden... So don't even try...
tips.mce2.waystones_world: Waystones are an excellent form of quick transportation, they use XP to teleport you, you can find Waystones scattered throughout the world.
tips.mce2.wither: The Wither is not what it seems.. Tread carefully..
tips.mce2.witherboss: In its first phase, The Wither cares not for you. You are nothing more than a small ant compared to its greatness.. It will wreak havoc on the land.. You will need to damage it to get its attention! BE WARNED: The Wither takes no prisoners...
tips.mce2.wormhole: Recall Potions will teleport you back home! You can find them in chests, or if you have access to The Nether you can craft them!
